Community views
=================

.. _community_views:

Here you can take a look at the views that builds this application. There will be two different views, the ones that builds the :ref:`public viewing <community_views_public>` and the one for the :ref:`forms <community_views_forms>`.


.. _community_views_public:

Public Views:
--------------

.. automodule:: community.views.communities
   :members:


.. _community_views_forms:

Forms:
---------

.. automodule:: community.views.forms
   :members:
